overview:
Bastien Petit is a Product Director currently working on Leadformance’s store locator application. He’s been with the company since its creation in 2007.

Over the past years, he’s been involved in Product Management and UX/UI design on a variety of other web-based products: Market Analysis tools, Content Management Systems, SEO tools, Lead Management applications.

Despite his strong french accent, he has a good experience in working with international teams, often remotely when needed. He also worked 1.5 years in Chennai, India (read more about this on his LinkedIn profile).

Before joining Leadformance, he was building applications and search engine optimized websites for a digital agency specialized in SEO and SEM.

He holds a Master’s degree in “Conception of interactive products” from Gobelins, a famous french design school.
